name: Raptors of SouthEdge
description:
In a world devastated by the Infection, mercenary groups ("Raptors") must face the road to keep what remains of the civilization safe. And the leader of one of these groups must fight against monsters and madness and keep his pack united to fulfill the most dangerous contract of all time. Art by José Luiz and Text by Lucas Carvalho.

Features:


Life or Death: Every choice matter. Each decision can change your ending. No story is equal to another.

Play as Before: You can play with the Classic System, inspired in the old Tabletop RPGs...

Play as Today: ... or You can play with the Advanced System, faster and with more strategic elements.

Challenges for All: For those who want to enjoy the story or for those who want no mercy: The difficulty levels provide an unique experience for all.
